name: Cosmic Golf (tete, FelkyMike)
description:
In Cosmic Golf, the objective is like regular golf: use your club to hit the ball into the hole before your opponent. The only difference here is gravity!

However, your opponents will not let you win so easily... Put traps on the field to sabotage them! Be careful though, you'll need to get through the traps, too.

Controls

  • While CHEATING:
    • Mouse -> put traps / interact with UI
  • While PLAYING:
    • Arrow Keys -> Change shot direction
    • Z -> Shoot (Press twice, watch for UI meter for hit strength)
    • R -> Restart (Back to CHEATING)

Credits

  • Art - FelkyMike
  • Programming - tete
  • Sounds:
    • AGFX, Drop ball in cup-2.wav
    • tim.kahn, boo 01.wav

Made for Major Jam 4: Cosmic
